column1: Hi @TeamYouTube, Why has my 30 day old #Coronavirus video been demonetized? I had it manually reviewed and it was still deemed to be demonetized. The #COVID19 topic is a red-hot topic, and this video is getting NO views. #StockMarketCrash2020

Schumer's denial of the President's actions for Coronavirus is representative of someone becoming mentally unstable. To lie so blatantly is beyond the regular prevarications of Democrats since the President's plans are clearly explained on CSPN. https://www.c-span.org/video/?469708-1/hhs-officials-hold-news-conference-coronavirus …
